inclusion.criterion: hospitalized in Department of Internal Medicine for minimum duration of 3 days
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: physical exam and lab studies were normal otherwise

inclusion.criterion: gender has no impact on usage of drug
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no mention of gender impacting treatment

exclusion.criterion: patient does not agree to participate in study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patient on NPO order including medications
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 41 year old man with tinea pedis infection, no underlying diseases mentioned
